__e: Well, under the circumstances, I'm not sure he's done you any favors.
You didn't like that she got the best of you.
It's just that... the person he's involved with, works for a law firm... that has been a consistent enemy of law and order in this city.
See what love the father has given us. And we are called the children of God.
He's also proven difficult to reach.
I don't imagine you're quite aware of the service you and Mr. Bauer provided this corporation last night.
Well... allow me to thank you at any rate for the great service you've done me.
We can... we can be more than what we've become, can't we?
His children turned out to be difficult... till he realized that the only thing that would calm them down... was his drug, Ephemerol.
I mean, two of them turned out to be bad guys, but even they were good teachers who really taught me how to use my powers.
I don't think many of them turned out to be true.

Happy Birthday, Jenna. Up until that moment, the rumors of my death wish had been greatly exaggerated.
